response.overview: A devoted veteran, Amarjeet Rana, receives an undercover mission to eliminate the devil who caused countless terror in the entire world and he fearlessly sets ahead on this venture. But due to some mishaps during his mission, he gets caught by the enemies and is bound to a chair and tortured. He meet the devil himself who is there to take revenge on Rana by torturing him to death. How will Rana face him? Will Rana be able to avenge his country or will he die in vain?
response.title: Amarjeet Rana
